EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Boston_OpenHouse_Q116.Confirmation - Microbrews and Microservices
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Spring Cloud Data Flow, Microservices and Microbrews Meetup. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, March 17, 2016 Time: 6:00-9:00 P.M. Location: 145 Broadway, 3rd Floor
Cambridge, MA 02142
{{my.Save the Date Microbrews}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/open-house/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=boston-open-house]]>.
